left.name: submitter_diagnosis_id
left.description: Indicate the diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this biospecimen acquisition was related to

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

right.name: submitter_diagnosis_id
right.description: Indicate the diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this biospecimen acquisition was related to.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

description.data: Indicate the diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this biospecimen acquisition was related to.

left.name: diagnosis_source_text
left.description: Condition as reported in the study's dataset

meta.notes: Provide exact information as per the dataset if coding to ICD-10 or MONDO ontologies is not possible

data.name: diagnosis_source_text
data.description: Condition as reported in the study's dataset

meta.notes: Provide exact information as per the dataset if coding to ICD-10 or MONDO ontologies is not possible

left.name: diagnosis_ICD_term
left.description: ICD-10 code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: C41.1: Malignant neoplasms of mandible, C16.9: Malignant neoplasm of stomach, unspecified
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in ICD-10 separated by a (:). For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

examples.data: C41.1: Malignant neoplasms of mandible, C16.9: Malignant neoplasm of stomach, unspecified

notes.data: Write code and full term used in ICD-10 separated by a (:). For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

left.name: diagnosis_mondo_term
left.description: Mondo code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: MONDO_0002131: jaw cancer, MONDO_0001056: gastric cancer
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in MONDO separated by a (:). For MONDO codes, refer to https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/mondo

data.name: diagnosis_mondo_term
data.description: Mondo code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: MONDO_0002131: jaw cancer, MONDO_0001056: gastric cancer
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in MONDO separated by a (:). For MONDO codes, refer to https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/mondo

right.name: diagnosis_ICD_code
right.description: ICD-10 code used to define condtion

meta.notes: For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

data.name: diagnosis_ICD_code
data.description: ICD-10 code used to define condtion

meta.notes: For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx
